original_text: But Jehoiada grew old and full of days, and died. He was 130 years old at his death.
korean_text: 여호야다가 나이가 많고 늙어서 죽으니 죽을 때에 백삼십 세라

sentences.original_text: But Jehoiada grew old and full of days,
He was 130 years old at his death.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 죽을 때에 나이가 백삼십 세였더라
